SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Circle
This Circle class implements the Shape interface and overrides the draw method to display and return the string "Circle::Draw()"
FactoryPatternDemo
The FactoryPatternDemo class demonstrates the Factory design pattern by using a ShapeFactory to create shape objects like Circle, Rectangle, and Square, and calling their draw methods.
Rectangle
This Rectangle class implements the Shape interface and overrides the draw method to display and return the string "Rectangle::Draw()"
Shape
The Shape interface defines a contract requiring implementing classes to provide their own version of the draw method.
ShapeFactory
The ShapeFactory class provides a getShape method that creates and returns an object of the specific shape type (Circle, Rectangle, or Square) based on the input string, ensuring dynamic object creation, and returns null if the shape type is unsupported or invalid.
Square
This Square class implements the Shape interface and overrides the draw method to display and return the string "Square::Draw()"
